about_the_game:
Welcome to the delicious universe of Kitchen Delights! Put your culinary skills to the test by becoming a chef in a restaurant or burger joint. Explore different game modes and challenge yourself to create delicious dishes, either alone or with friends.



Choose Your Path
  • Choose to be a chef in an elegant restaurant or make your way to fame in a burger joint. The decision is yours!

Customer Service
  • Deliver dishes directly to tables or to the counter for delivery orders.

Star Challenge
  • Work hard to achieve the coveted 5-star rating. With every perfect dish and exemplary service, you get closer to the prestige of becoming a culinary reference.

Multiplayer with Friends
  • Turn the experience into a culinary feast by playing with friends.

name: Kitchen Delights Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Kitchen Delights is an exciting cooking game that will put your culinary skills to the test, where you can be a chef in a restaurant or a burger joint, creating delicious dishes. With a touch of chaos and lots of fun.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish
